item.title: CO2 emissions (metric tons per capita)
item.description: Information on choropleth maps showing the Carbon dioxide emissions in metric tons per capita for the world's countries from 1960 to 2014.

item.title: Forest Area Percentage of Land Area
item.description: Information on choropleth maps showing the forest area percentage of land area for the world's countries from 1990 to 2016 based on data from the Food and Agriculture Organization.

item.title: A Decade of Climate Change in the Guardian
item.description: Explore a decade of climate change, global warming, natural disaster, extreme weather, pollution and deforestation in the articles published by the Guardian.
